Combine demographic data with latent subtype classifications

Source: R/combine_subtype_and_demos.R
combine_subtype_and_demos.Rd

was originally going to be more useful, but got reduced to spaghetti. probably can be deleted

Usage

combine_subtype_and_demos(patient_data, subtype_data)

Arguments

patient_data

a data.frame containing patient demographics

subtype_data

a SuSt_table (produced as a list element by extract_results_from_pickle())

Value

a tibble::tbl_df combining patient_data and subtype_data via dplyr::bind_cols() (assuming they were provided in the same row-order)

Examples

sim_data |>
  dplyr::filter(Category == "Patient") |>
  combine_subtype_and_demos(
    subtype_data = sim_subtype_and_stage_table
  )
#> # A tibble: 20 × 16
